name: ibnusyuhada/slim-tegar
description: Slim Tegar is a package that designed for integrating PHP-DI and Slim Framework version 3.x.x. This package is an Slim Bridge advanced of http://php-di.org/doc/frameworks/slim.html. You don't need to extends any class of PHP-DI or Slim just to make container configuration. Slim Tegar also providing the easy way to implement Closure and MVC routes.
